column5: I thought May 24th was flare disposal day
From the orion disposal site  To dispose of expired marine pyrotechnic distress signals, Orion recommends the following method:
I thought May 24th was flare disposal day  July 1st and New-years eve too.
i always thought you keep out of date flares for personal protection someone trying to steal your truck will run real fast with a flare burning his butt...lol
Out of Date flares............now that funny....
I keep the last expired set in the boat as backup. What the heck, they're paid for. New set satisfies the regs.
